chapter.1.quest.1.description.1: Right click the pipe connection to change to extraction mode.
chapter.1.quest.1.title: Collecting some Element Juice
chapter.1.quest.10.description.1:
Good way to extend your fuel supply, and you'll need Creosote Oil for Treated wood, used in many projects going forward.
You'll need 108 (64 + 44) Coke Oven Bricks for each coke oven you want to build.
chapter.1.quest.10.subtitle: Treated Wood
chapter.1.quest.10.title: Coke Oven
chapter.1.quest.11.description.1:
Welcome to Multiblock Madness 2! 
To convert your Quest Book into a tome containing most manuals needed for the pack, just left click the air with it.
chapter.1.quest.11.task.1.title: Any Logs
chapter.1.quest.11.title: Getting Wood
chapter.1.quest.12.subtitle: Better Drawers?
chapter.1.quest.12.task.1.title: Any #functionalstorage:drawer
chapter.1.quest.12.title: Deep Storage
chapter.1.quest.13.description.1: Use the Linking Tool to connect Drawers to the Controller.
chapter.1.quest.13.subtitle: Does not need to be next to drawers to link
chapter.1.quest.14.subtitle: These multiply your total storage
chapter.1.quest.14.title: Drawer Upgrades!
chapter.1.quest.15.description.1: Place one of the ballons on the Cloud Chest, and the other on any other chest to upload it to the cloud.
chapter.1.quest.15.subtitle: You'll need to head to cloud level to get the parts
chapter.1.quest.16.task.1.title: Tier 1 Furnace
chapter.1.quest.16.title: Furnace Upgrades
chapter.1.quest.17.title: Backpacks have Upgrades now!
chapter.1.quest.18.description.1:
You'll find large veins of which can include several types of materials.


In order to attach your drill augment, you'll need to unlock the Engineers Workbench by crafting Treated Wood.
Refill by crafting the drill and fuel together.
chapter.1.quest.18.subtitle: Expect lots of Ore
chapter.1.quest.18.task.1.title: Any Cobblestone
chapter.1.quest.18.title: Going Mining
chapter.1.quest.19.description.1: Having people find you is even worse.
chapter.1.quest.19.subtitle: Looking for things, not so much
chapter.1.quest.19.title: Finding things is fun!
chapter.1.quest.20.subtitle: Reusable Casts are made from Brass
chapter.1.quest.20.task.5.title: Sand Casts
chapter.1.quest.20.title: Metal Tools
chapter.1.quest.21.title: Chest Upgrades!
chapter.1.quest.22.description.1: You'll need to speed up your rotation to use the mixer. The simplest way is to attach a large cog to your Water Wheels, and a small cog to that one. The small cog will be spinning faster!
chapter.1.quest.23.title: Primitive Rotational Power
chapter.1.quest.24.description.1:
You'll need plenty of Brass to upgrade your Create parts, while Bronze is used in Thermal, and Invar is mostly used in multiblocks.


Nickel and Zinc are most commonly found in the Nether.
chapter.1.quest.24.task.1.title: Tier 1 Alloys
chapter.1.quest.24.title: Basic Alloys
chapter.1.quest.25.title: Basic Item Routing
chapter.1.quest.26.subtitle: Replacement for Kelp
chapter.1.quest.27.description.1:
The Barrel can replace any of the scaffolding, while the tank can be extended upwards to hold more water.
You'll need to pipe water into the tank!
chapter.1.quest.27.subtitle: Some passive resources
chapter.1.quest.27.title: The Sludge Sifter
chapter.1.quest.28.description.1: Most fluid handling with Create needs to by done with pipes, rather then buckets.
chapter.1.quest.28.title: Fluid Transfer
chapter.1.quest.29.description.1: Used to drain bodies of liquid.
chapter.1.quest.29.subtitle: Infinite Water/Lava
chapter.1.quest.3.title: Elemental Infused Items
chapter.1.quest.30.subtitle: Use Ponder!
chapter.1.quest.30.title: Better Rotational Power
chapter.1.quest.31.description.1: You won't be able to fill the Spout with buckets, so you'll need to rig up the pipes to fill it for you.
chapter.1.quest.31.subtitle: This can also be used to automate Treated Wood.
chapter.1.quest.32.description.1: Elements! It only takes a few seconds to fill a tiny jar from a wild source, or about 5 elemental shards if you've collected some from drops.
chapter.1.quest.32.subtitle: Check out the Elementopedia in your Akashic Tome!
chapter.1.quest.34.description.1: You can use any type of stone to Create "Stone Alloy"
chapter.1.quest.35.title: Upgrades!
chapter.1.quest.36.subtitle: Can be used to craft string
chapter.1.quest.36.title: Hemp
chapter.1.quest.37.description.1: Easy way to strip wood, and get the bark as a byproduct!
chapter.1.quest.37.task.2.title: Any #farmersdelight:tools/knives
chapter.1.quest.38.description.1: These Compound Ores can be processed down into a large array of different materials.
chapter.1.quest.38.task.1.title: Compound Ore Grit
chapter.1.quest.38.title: So, you've found some new Ore
chapter.1.quest.39.description.1: Beneath the ring of Ore Samples, you'll find a massive vein of whichever ore is displayed by the sample.
chapter.1.quest.39.task.1.title: Raw Compound Ore
chapter.1.quest.39.title: Ore Deposits
chapter.1.quest.4.description.1:
Large Cogwheels can be used in conjunction with small Cogs to increase rotational speed.


You'll be needing a lot of these (with the possible exception of the Large Cogwheel) so be sure to craft extra!
chapter.1.quest.4.title: Basic Create Components
chapter.1.quest.5.description.1: You can rig this up manually with a Depot underneath, or have it above a belt for automation.
chapter.1.quest.5.subtitle: Unlocking Upgrades!
chapter.1.quest.7.description.1:
Check the Tinkers Station for which parts you need to make a trusty Pickaxe.


After placing some blank patterns in the Part Builder, you'll be able to craft the needed parts.
chapter.1.quest.7.title: Tinkers Tools
chapter.1.quest.8.description.1: Hold Alt to access items stored inside the toolbox.
chapter.1.quest.8.title: The Toolbox
chapter.1.quest.9.subtitle: Use Ponder!
chapter.1.title: Chapter 1
chapter.2.quest.1.description.1: Auxiliary items are not comsumed for crafting.
chapter.2.quest.1.title: Imbument Chamber
chapter.2.quest.10.description.1: You'll need to place these underneath whatever you're trying to heat, and feed them burnable items (or fluids).
chapter.2.quest.11.subtitle: Level 1 Ore Processing
chapter.2.quest.11.title: Crushing Wheel
chapter.2.quest.12.subtitle: Check out page 2 of the Ponder
chapter.2.quest.13.description.1: You'll be able to find the Book of Natural Aura in your Akashic Tome.
chapter.2.quest.13.title: Paint the Trees Gold
chapter.2.quest.14.title: Ritual of the Forest
chapter.2.quest.16.description.1: Build in a 4x4, then hammer the front with the Engineers Hammer
chapter.2.quest.16.title: Easy Alloys
chapter.2.quest.17.task.1.title: Any #powah:generator/basic
chapter.2.quest.17.title: Basic Power Generation
chapter.2.quest.19.description.1: Place the Rods near the Orb and fill with crafting materials.
chapter.2.quest.19.title: Tier 2 Powah
chapter.2.quest.2.description.1: Zinc can be found much more frequently in the Nether.
chapter.2.quest.2.title: The Brass Age
chapter.2.quest.20.subtitle: Can't find Blazes? No problem!
chapter.2.quest.21.description.1: Must be built in the Nether.
chapter.2.quest.21.task.1.title: Crimson/Warped Planks
chapter.2.quest.21.title: Crimson Altar
chapter.2.quest.22.title: Steel
chapter.2.quest.23.title: Vinteum
chapter.2.quest.24.task.2.title: Any #tconstruct:scorched_tanks
chapter.2.quest.24.title: The Foundry
chapter.2.quest.25.description.1: This is required to extract higher tier Ores from Compound Ore.
chapter.2.quest.26.description.1: You'll probably need to set up a Steam Engine to generate enough Rotation to power the drill.
chapter.2.quest.28.description.1: Once the Steam Engine has been placed, it no longer stores water. Rather it has a flow meter, shown while looking with the Goggles. You'll need one bar of water for each Steam Engine you will be using.
chapter.2.quest.28.title: Steam Engines!
chapter.2.quest.29.task.1.title: Movement Bases
chapter.2.quest.29.task.2.title: Chassis
chapter.2.quest.29.title: Wood Farm
chapter.2.quest.30.title: Bottled Aura
chapter.2.quest.31.description.1: You'll need to unlock steel for the Crafting Terminal.
chapter.2.quest.31.title: Basic Digital Storage
chapter.2.quest.32.description.1: Throw the quartz and redstone into water to combine into Fluix.
chapter.2.quest.32.title: Fluix Dust
chapter.2.quest.34.title: Energetic Alloy
chapter.2.quest.35.description.1: Used to craft gems from dust.
chapter.2.quest.36.title: Scorched Bricks
chapter.2.quest.38.description.1: Could be used to automate compact crafting with a bit of tinkering!
chapter.2.quest.5.description.1: Attaching a large Cog to the top allows you to configure the speed of the attached system.
chapter.2.quest.6.description.1: Brass Tunnels/Funnels have a filter spot that can be clicked with an item to allow for simple whitelisting, or with a configured Filter for more complex options.
chapter.2.quest.6.title: Advanced Logistics
chapter.2.quest.9.description.1: Zinc, Nickel, Gold, and Quartz, are all much more common in the Nether, while Cobalt and Blazing Quartz can only be found there. You'll also find Rich Ores, which drop double the amount of Raw Ore.
chapter.2.quest.9.task.1.title: The Nether
chapter.2.title: Chapter 2
chapter.3.quest.1.description.1:
Flip to the correct book in your Tome to complete this quest.


You'll need to read it to get started. Following the internal guide for Mana and Artifice will be your best path moving forward with the mod.
chapter.3.quest.10.title: More Elemental Infused Items
chapter.3.quest.13.title: Basic Engineering Blocks
chapter.3.quest.14.task.8.title: Squeezer
chapter.3.quest.14.title: The Squeezer
chapter.3.quest.15.description.1: Simple gears, and double production of wires and rods.
chapter.3.quest.15.subtitle: Better part creation
chapter.3.quest.15.title: The Metal Press
chapter.3.quest.16.task.10.title: Arc Furnace
chapter.3.quest.16.title: The Arc Furnace

chapter.3.quest.17.title: The Refinery

chapter.3.quest.18.title: The Crusher

chapter.3.quest.19.title: The Automated Workbench

chapter.3.quest.20.title: The Diesel Generator

chapter.3.quest.21.title: The Mixer

chapter.3.quest.22.title: Fermenting

chapter.3.quest.23.title: Reinforced Blast Furnace

chapter.3.quest.24.title: The Industral Metal
chapter.3.quest.26.task.7.title: Bottling Machine
chapter.3.quest.26.title: The Bottling Machine
chapter.3.quest.28.title: Crafting Components
chapter.3.quest.30.title: More Engineer's Blocks
chapter.3.quest.31.task.8.title: The Excavator
chapter.3.quest.31.title: The Excavator
chapter.3.quest.33.description.1: Once you have access to the Smeltery, you can use it to alloy Coke and Iron to make Steel.
chapter.3.quest.33.title: The Smeltery, aka tier 2 alloys
chapter.3.quest.34.description.1: A great sustanable fuel source, and can be used for plastic later on.
chapter.3.quest.34.title: Biodesiel
chapter.3.quest.36.description.1: Tier 2 Metals, like Cobalt and Aluminum, require at least processing in the Foundry with a high temperature fuel such as Blazing Blood.
chapter.3.quest.37.subtitle: Found in the End
chapter.3.quest.38.task.7.title: The Assembler
chapter.3.quest.38.title: Autocrafting with Fluids
chapter.3.quest.39.description.1: Check the Ore Processing page for a preview of the potential ores you can find.
chapter.3.quest.39.task.1.title: The End
chapter.3.quest.39.title: Visit The End
chapter.3.quest.41.description.1:
Select a Schematic for your blueprint in the table, then after placing it in world, load it in your cannon. Make sure it has Gunpowder and a chest nearby with every block needed.


If using for Compact Crafting, you'll need to use the Rescan Field Proxy before it will allow the craft.
chapter.3.quest.41.title: Fast Multiblock Creation
chapter.3.quest.47.description.1:
The Ore Shrine is basic method of in world ore collection.
Elements must be piped directly into any shrine.
chapter.3.quest.47.title: Shrines
chapter.3.quest.50.description.1: The IE Assembler can use fluids that have been piped for bucket recipes.
chapter.3.quest.51.description.1: You might want to set up some good power supply before mass producing AE components.
chapter.3.quest.51.title: Advanced Energetic Alloys
chapter.3.quest.55.title: Auto Crafting!
chapter.3.quest.9.description.1: Items must be placed in the shown order.
chapter.3.title: Chapter 3
chapter.4.quest.12.title: Better Circuits
chapter.4.quest.13.description.1:
After placing the Rocket on the 3x3 Launch Pad, shift right click to open the gui for fueling.


After launching, you'll be given the option of where to land. Your goal is the Moon! Once you get there, you'll need to remove the rocket from the lander and set up a return Launch Pad.
chapter.4.quest.13.title: Destination: Moon
chapter.4.quest.15.description.1: You'll need to fill your suit with Oxygen before heading to space.
chapter.4.quest.15.title: Space Suit
chapter.4.quest.17.description.1: Stacking up to 4 Refinery Outputs on the top (and insulating them), will allow you to get the maximum amount of products from your Crude Oil.
chapter.4.quest.20.description.1: You'll need to craft up some Pressurized Aluminum Alloy in the Pressure Chamber for this multiblock.
chapter.4.quest.22.description.1: You'll also need to cover the Cog Blocks with water.
chapter.4.quest.23.description.1: If used in the Flotation Tank, you'll be able to get some byproducts!
chapter.4.quest.23.title: Purifed Water
chapter.4.quest.25.description.1:
You will need to pipe items in and out of the Pressure Chamber for crafting.


The 4 slots surrounded by blue are for Upgrades.
chapter.4.quest.25.title: Pressure Chamber
chapter.4.quest.26.description.1: Attach the Safety Tube Module to keep your system from exploding if pressure gets too high.
chapter.4.quest.26.task.1.title: Any Basic Compressor
chapter.4.quest.26.title: Compressing Air
chapter.4.quest.27.description.1:
The Vortex Tube will passively cool the blue side while heating the red side. If supplied Air Pressure, it will enhance this function significantly. Additionally, by adding a Heat Sink to the hot side, the cold side will be able to go much lower.


By attaching the Heat Frame to a chest, and heating it, you can make an impromptu furnace! If cooled instead, you will be able to multiply your plastic output from buckets.
chapter.4.quest.27.title: Using Heat
chapter.4.quest.28.description.1: Use the Sensor on the ground to find an oil deposit, which you can then drill up to the surface with the Gas Lift.
chapter.4.quest.28.subtitle: Its probably nothing
chapter.4.quest.28.title: More of that strange oil
chapter.4.quest.29.title: Explosions!
chapter.4.quest.32.description.1: Running out of channels yet? Each ME Controller can handle up to 64 Channels per side!
chapter.4.quest.7.description.1: Place the molten plastic in world to have it solidify into a Plastic Sheet, or place inside a chest that has been cooled via Heat Frame.
chapter.4.quest.8.description.1: You can use Bio Diesel or LPG (from Refining Oil) to make Plastic.
chapter.4.title: Chapter 4
chapter.5.quest.1.title: Tier 2 Rocket, to Mars
chapter.5.quest.12.title: Laser Circuit Assembly
chapter.5.title: Chapter 5
chapter.6.quest.1.description.1: Found in high quantities in most dimensions, this versitile metal commonly spawns with small amounts of Gold, Nickel, or Earth.
chapter.6.quest.1.subtitle: Y150 - -64
chapter.6.quest.11.description.1: Common ore in the Nether, can spawn with Sulfur.
chapter.6.quest.12.description.1: Common ore in the Nether, can spawn with Sulfur and Earth.
chapter.6.quest.13.description.1: Spawns as part of Redstone veins.
chapter.6.quest.14.description.1: Spawns as part of Redstone veins.
chapter.6.quest.15.description.1: Spawns as part of Overworld Tin veins.
chapter.6.quest.16.description.1: Spawns as part of Overworld Tin veins.
chapter.6.quest.17.subtitle: Y80 - -48
chapter.6.quest.19.task.1.title: The Nether
chapter.6.quest.19.title: Nether Veins
chapter.6.quest.2.description.1: Gold is most commonly found in the Nether in large Veins and can contain Luminite and Air, or in smaller amounts as part of Iron and Copper veins in the overworld.
chapter.6.quest.20.task.1.title: The Overworld
chapter.6.quest.20.title: Overworld Veins
chapter.6.quest.22.subtitle: Spawns as part of Overworld Arcanite veins.
chapter.6.quest.23.subtitle: Spawns as part of Overworld Arcanite veins.
chapter.6.quest.24.description.1: Spawns as part of Quartz veins in the Nether.
chapter.6.quest.25.description.1: Certus Quartz has a chance to spawn in these Quartz Veins.
chapter.6.quest.25.subtitle: Y150 - 30
chapter.6.quest.26.description.1: Uncommon ore in the Nether, can spawn with Luminite.
chapter.6.quest.26.subtitle: Y200 - 75
chapter.6.quest.27.description.1: Spawns in Zinc, Iron, and Nickel veins.
chapter.6.quest.29.task.1.title: The Moon
chapter.6.quest.29.title: Moon Veins
chapter.6.quest.3.description.1: Tin is common in the Overworld, and spawns with small amounts of Fluorite, Apatite, and Air.
chapter.6.quest.3.subtitle: Y256 - 0
chapter.6.quest.32.description.1: Common ore on the Moon, can spawn with Aluminum.
chapter.6.quest.33.description.1: Common ore on the Moon, can spawn with Runite.
chapter.6.quest.4.description.1: Copper spawns commonly in the Overworld, and veins can contain Gold and Water.
chapter.6.quest.4.subtitle: Y256 - -15
chapter.6.quest.41.description.1: Spawns in the End with Thorium
chapter.6.quest.44.description.1: Also spawns veins of Certus Quartz
chapter.6.quest.44.task.1.title: The End
chapter.6.quest.44.title: The End Veins
chapter.6.quest.5.description.1: Commonly found in the overworld, with diamonds if its deep enough.
chapter.6.quest.5.subtitle: Y256 - -64
chapter.6.quest.53.task.1.title: Build an Arc Furnace
chapter.6.quest.57.task.1.title: Any Crushed Ore
chapter.6.quest.57.title: Crushed Ore
chapter.6.quest.59.task.1.title: Any Chunks
chapter.6.quest.59.title: Ore Chunks
chapter.6.quest.6.description.1: Rare Overworld Vein, found with Vinteum and Sapphire, and can spawn with Niter if below deepslate level.
chapter.6.quest.6.subtitle: Y20 - -60
chapter.6.quest.62.title: Build the Crusher
chapter.6.quest.63.task.1.title: Any #forge:ores/lump
chapter.6.quest.63.title: Lump of Ore
chapter.6.quest.64.subtitle: Y100 - 32
chapter.6.quest.7.subtitle: Y-10 - -64
chapter.6.quest.8.description.1: Uncommonly found in the Overworld or Nether at Y100 - 0.
